data.description: Company Overview​At Motorola Solutions, we believe that everything starts with our people. We’re a global close-knit community, united by the relentless pursuit to help keep people safer everywhere. Our critical communications, video security and command center technologies support public safety agencies and enterprises alike, enabling the coordination that’s critical for safer communities, safer schools, safer hospitals and safer businesses. Connect with a career that matters, and help us build a safer future. Department OverviewMissions and Insights team - CAPE Aerial Telepresence provides industry-leading software for remote drone operation, live video streaming, and evidence capture. Learn more at CAPE.com.Job DescriptionThe Missions and Insights team is looking for a Full Stack Engineer intern for our team in Boston.  This is an excellent opportunity to join a small, multidisciplinary team with a critical skillset.  You will directly contribute to the full lifecycle of projects, including https://www.cape.com/ and more.Scope of ResponsibilitiesContribute to frontend (Angular) and backend (Python/Django) architecture, development, and testing.  Perform code reviews and Maintain CI/CD pipelines, production environments, and documentation.Qualifications:Working towards Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related technical disciplineExperience in Python is required, building RESTful APIs and Microservices using Django or Flask.Strong web application development using Angular or React.Experience with relational databases such as Postgres, SQLite, MySQL.Familiarity with Azure, AWS or GCP cloud infrastructure.Experience with Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD), writing and maintaining unit tests, and environment configuration.Highly self-motivated with a desire to explore new approaches and technologies.Strong written and verbal communication skills.Must be a U.S. CitizenA strong candidate may also experience working with: DevOps (tracking, pipelines) and Git (source control, code reviews).video/data streaming, handling data files, and analytics libraries.clustering, tracking, and pathfinding algorithms or machine learning libraries.This position is subject to working in high security areas governed by the US Department of Justice's "Criminal Justice Information Services (CJIS) Security Policy" and therefore requires successfully passing a more stringent fingerprint background check administered by Motorola Solutions Inc. customers.#LI-RS1Basic RequirementsMust be pursuing a Bachelor's, Master's, or Doctoral degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or a similar field and graduating December 1st, 2026 or laterMust be a U.S. CitizenMust be able to obtain background clearance as required by government customer.Travel
